title: Unitary systems can have local elections

content.question: Which of the following is true of a unitary system?

choices.label: It has no local or subnational governments at all.
It constitutionally protects local and subnational governments.
It must implement policy uniformly across subnational units.
It is more decentralized than a federal system.
It can have competitive local elections.

content.answer: It can have competitive local elections.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
